description: EU sources say talks are constructive, with both sides keen to avoid blame for a no-deal Brexit.
title: Brexit: Tentative progress made as EU hints at concessions
title_page: Brexit: Tentative progress made as EU hints at concessions - BBC News
maintext: "We're carrying on talking because no-deal is a big deal," one EU contact told me. "We think it will have a dramatic impact on lives and livelihoods. As long as talks aren't going backwards, it would be irresponsible not to give this a chance."
